title: Forever101
author: Forever101
content: The political atmosphere wey dey Nigeria dey tense pass previous years wey election b don happen for our naija. Upon say many person eye don open to do wetin right and choose who dey want, we suppose deal with the issue of tribal sentiment among us. If we fit settle this matter with sense then we go fit do wetin go make naija better. The people wey dey use our head know say na tribal and religious sentiment go win the thing, that is why dey turn shap shap to that logic.My people of naija na one we b, abeg make we love each other, make we no kill each other because of any politician, after election them go gether sit down dey jollificate. Na hu die ihm own finishThe oga patapata of wetin I wan talk be say make we stand for truth, you are the leaders of tomorrow don turn national anthem for us even when some people hear this anthem till them dey old we never see the future wey Dem be dey talk about. My country people, make we stand gidigba for truth abeg. Naija go still better

comments.author: ololajulo
comments.body: The ruling start am with tribal sentiment and even people for him tribe no accept am well. Na them interprete to all Nigeria say dem no want wetin he talk but the religious aspect came from opposing party. This has so much division from everyone and social media/news channels support the trajectory.  Every loser in this election can feel the blame and it is too late. Now the witches and wizard are publicly showing their support.

comments.author: Cryptomiles1
comments.body: We don't sees ourselves as one this mentality of that Ethnic groups and religious has really spoilt the and keep the country in a dripping state where nothing progresses in this our precious and lovable country.Until we change the changes we are crying for may not gets to us we want it. The leaders are to be blamed.

comments.body: Quote from: Forever101 on May 01, 2023, 04:53:16 PMNigerians dey learn evry day, na watin dey mak some of d wrongs way dey our political system 2 stil dey persist. If u check, most of d election matter, na Court dem dey carry am go, pipo dey tak up case 4 social media, twitter, Facebook nd d rest. Where e dey weak persn na wen u go hear say, dem don resolve later out of court.Na why u kwa no gats carry anode persn matta 4 head bt, hw e wan take l beta wthout us carrying d matter 4 head.Still, u gats pick ur words carefully wen u dey talk sensitive talk, mak e no turn watin dem go con fuse u 4 ur sleep.

comments.author: Framelover
comments.body: Make we address the tribal and religious sentiment wey dey affect we. Make we no allow politicians to use we do dem tin. We be one people and suppose love each other. 9ja go still better if we no give up hope. As young ppl make we stand for truth and hold leaders accountable.
